storyInfo:
At the outskirts of the central district, Rosmontis and the elite operator Raidian start a joint operation to elucidate the enemy's configuration.
During the process, the Doctor learns more about Rosmontis's past.

attributes.content: Chernobog Central District 1:20 PM
Raidian, this is Kal'tsit. We’re on the edge of the central district, four hundred and ten meters out from the warehouse, seventeen, sixty-seven, southwest.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Are you in position? Is the operation going according to plan?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: 'Unimpeded?'
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The situation on the ground seems to be in line with our expectations.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Reunion has deployed the guerrilla fighters at hubs throughout the core city, and stationed Reunion regulars or Sarkaz mercenaries elsewhere.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It would be unwise to spread their defenses thinly across the entire map. They will gather their elites in a few key locations. That’s what I would do if I were leading Reunion.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Dr. Kal’tsit!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I know you want to speak to Raidian, Amiya. Patience.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I... I do too...
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: ...We’re on a mission. Next time, okay?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Oh, um... okay.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Raidian, I have Amiya here for you.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Right!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Raidian, this is Amiya.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: (Well... You saw how Amiya and Rosmontis reacted.)
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: (Our younger personnel love Raidian. But she may be a little too warm and friendly for adults.)
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: (The adolescents have the most trouble with her.)
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: (Their need to self-actualize tends to conflict with Raidian’s persistent motherliness.)
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: (I generally avoid putting them in the same team. You should check the manual for such details when planning.)
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Right... I saw, Raidian, yes.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: That’s correct. No, that’s not a standard tactic for guerrilla fighters. It’s more like... hm...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Yes! Like the Doctor said, Raidian, Reunion has mixed things up a bit, but you can still see the shadow of the Ursus military here.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: They’ve undergone strict military training... Yes, that’s likely.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The core network of Reunion personnel could be Infected who have received Ursus military training.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: They’re the only ones who could gather up such a large group of Infected.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It’s clear that this battle won’t be an easy win for us.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Hm? No, I’m fine. Rosmontis and I, all the Rhodes Island operators... we all wanted to be here.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Uh huh, it’s okay, Raidian, I have Dr. {@nickname} and Dr. Kal'tsit with me.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: All right, Amiya, it’s time to begin.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Right. Okay, Raidian, it’s up to you and Dr. Kal'tsit.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: First thing’s first, we have to make good use of our comms.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Team R-4, activate your equipment.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Raidian, it will take Rosmontis ten minutes to cast her Arts. During that time, we cannot lose comms for even a split second, unless we determine that we have to disconnect.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Continued use of Originium Arts will cause you discomfort, and if the nausea becomes unbearable, you are to immediately take the supplement I formulated for you.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Moderate dizziness is a side effect. It won’t harm your nervous system, but it will massively drain your strength.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Be careful not to overdose. After the first ten minutes, you can take intermittent breaks. Do not overexert yourself.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: We’re asking a lot of you, Raidian.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Rosmontis, all of the enemy’s messages will be sent to your portable terminal via Raidian. Feel them, and log them.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Should their location change, you cannot lose them. Seize their feelings and log them again.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Reach out with your body, Rosmontis, and picture yourself roaming the city.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I understand, Dr. Kal'tsit.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Amiya...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You have your work cut out for you. If anything anomalous happens, I will stop your casting. The instant you feel any pain, let me know.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Rosmontis... I’m going closer to you.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Yes, I’m ready too. I’m not scared. Amiya, don’t be scared of me.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: I won’t. I’m not scared of Rosmontis. We won’t be scared.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Amiya is stabilizing Rosmontis’s emotions.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You may not want to look directly at them, Dr. {@nickname}. It is unwise for any but the most tragically afflicted warriors to look directly at the expansion of the essence of Rosmontis’s Arts.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: Excuse me?!;...Amiya...?;You’re can’t mean our little bunny...?

attributes.content: I figured you’d realize it sooner.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Or that you already knew but hadn’t indicated as much to me.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But yes, Dr. {@nickname}.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...Amiya’s battles, both physical and mental, have been far beyond what any human being should have to endure.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Two, or maybe three would be okay. The more people to share the burden, the better.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Dr. {@nickname}, I’m not talking specifically about a memory or a battlefield experience. This refers to demands on both responsibility and physical ability.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: If you’d like, you could hold Amiya’s hand to share that burden.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: No, not today, anyway. You and I have another urgent task.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: We need to buy them precious time.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: A pharmaceutical company investigates the root cause of a problem, adapts to the environment, allocates functions appropriately, and looks for a breakthrough.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Our target is smaller and more precise than in a conventional battle. A small tactical assault team’s work is closer to a surgery than it is to a firefight.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: What the warmongers can’t do falls within our area of expertise.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Rhodes Island is going to take out the enemy command in the core city. All our objectives center on rooting out the cause of this disease.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But even if we excise the cancer, if the cause of the problem remains unknown to us, it will not be fundamentally solved.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Dr. {@nickname}, I do hope you will give this due consideration.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: —Who are our patients?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The normal Infected? The Ursus who were Infected? Reunion? Or this city?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: And where is the cause of this disease?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: We’ve discussed how Reunion is not maintaining the city’s communication networks.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It has become clear that Talulah deliberately kept Originium clusters from the Catastrophe in the city to maintain a state of chaos.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: That will massively disrupt our communications.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Even our most advanced equipment will not function under these conditions.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But now, thanks to elite operator Raidian, we can make use of the otherwise chaotic airwaves.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: That leaves us with a direct, reliable method of communication, and a tactical advantage.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: True.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You saw the runners carrying megaphones. The guerrillas use these antiquated methods to carry intelligence and orders in encrypted messages.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: We have yet to properly map the movements of these runners, but Rosmontis is working on it.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Their transmissions may not be instantaneous, and are limited in range, but it is the most stable and disciplined method in a hostile environment.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Can you guess what’s wrong with this method?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: It depends on the person first giving the order?;...the source.;The squad can’t survive without its head.

attributes.content: Correct.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The real commander’s location is hidden.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: What would you do in that position, Doctor?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: I’d flush them out!;...Use bait.;I’d have to cause some chaos first.

attributes.content: Correct.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Now we’ve focused our thinking. This is another tactical advantage.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Doctor, the Arts Rosmontis is releasing will show us the location of every runner and their patrol routes.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: She will expand her consciousness and capture every physical structure within range. At the same time, her mental state will grow increasingly chaotic.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Amiya is working to flatten those emotions.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Raidian is the core of our communications. With her Arts, we can communicate unimpeded for a short period of time.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: We just need to wait for Rosmontis to finish her part, then we go.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: For now, the guerrillas know nothing about us.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: They are completely unaware that we are targeting their communications, or that we are able to work against the ancient Sarkaz witchcraft..
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: We do have our methods, limited as they may be.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: After striking the runners, the guerrillas will respond. Within a half hour, they will have new runners working, and they will be hardened against further attacks.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: They will be on high alert, and may not have weaknesses to exploit.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: What’s more, we will have exposed our positioning and tactics, putting us in a difficult situation.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: However, we only need to execute a single surgical strike. With that one blow, we will force out their command unit.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The guerrillas won’t be expecting another Infected spec ops team.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: This is a tactical advantage.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: I’m more concerned with implementation. Will it work?

attributes.content: —I’m not going to exaggerate.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Dr. {@nickname}, even with our three tactical advantages, we are more likely to fail than succeed.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: Then why do it like this?

attributes.content: Because anything else would be even less likely to succeed.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...Rosmontis should have started her search. Hold your breath, and don’t look.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: —First—
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: I... found three.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Rosmontis... you’re okay. Come here, a little closer.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...Four.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Your ear. I’m running my finger over your ear like this... you can hear it. These are just fragments of your imagination, and you’ve seen it all before.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Mm...
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Five.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Doctor, are you afraid of getting hurt?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: These three teams will split up for the fight. Each will be responsible for enemy teams and crippling the runners in a different sector. We cannot give them a chance to get the word out.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Each of our squads will also redistribute their power projection, which I have already planned for. Don’t worry.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: As for you, you’re with me.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Bring your security specialist. You can’t refuse. I think.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The guerrillas’ equipment is of excellent quality, similar to that of the Ursus military, and they keep to discipline and tactics even more harshly and effectively.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Sarkaz, Ursus, Liberi and other races all united under a single banner.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You are safe only under my protection. I don’t want Rosmontis to kill you by accident, and I don’t want Amiya to distract herself trying to protect you. And Raidian, you haven’t even met.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You can’t cause trouble with me.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...Wait.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: —Rosmontis?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Ah... Nng...
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Raidian, sever Rosmontis’s connection. Now!
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Amiya, her mental state?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But... Rosmontis... The scene I reached out to was stable, nothing strange was happening... It shouldn’t have...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It’s... falling? She’s... looking at the sky?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...Lost. She’s lost. She’s falling.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Body temperature dropping, shortness of breath... Sharp decrease in endorphin levels.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: (Shakes her head)
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: This isn’t like Raidian using supplements to replenish her energy. Rosmontis’s Arts throw off a balance inside her body, but not an entirely biological one.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Injecting steroids to increase hormone production can seriously disrupt her endocrine system that could result in a failure of her inhibitor functions.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You left me? Why... I have to...
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: —Why did you leave me...?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Bad is not an excuse to indulge my incompetence.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Dr. {@nickname}, I will not resort to emergency measures that cause permanent bodily harm... no matter how effective they may be.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Rosmontis’s problem is not biological. She is the only one who can solve it.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Rosmontis.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Rosmontis, look at my hand.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Doc... tor... Kal... tsit..
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Look at Dr. Kal’tsit’s hand.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: My hand is stroking your face now. Look, Dr. Kal'tsit is here. Look at me.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...Hnng.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Rosmontis, Kal'tsit doesn’t have much time to stay with you. Neither does Amiya...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Outcast, Misery, Blaze, or anyone else.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But for now, Amiya and I are here.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Uh... huh.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Keep pushing, Rosmontis. Walk forward.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Yes, Rosmontis... over here. Walk this way. On the deck.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It’s very hard, I know... But, Rosmontis, this is the deck, you can step on it. You won’t fall through.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: This is Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We’re here with you.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I’m here with you.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: —I know.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: ...Doctor... Kal’tsit... give me...
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: The... data.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: —Okay.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Raidian, connect Rosmontis’s terminal. She’s okay.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I’m sure. Do it.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: —Second.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Seven.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: I see..
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Her... Rosmontis is standing now. Her consciousness is peaceful and harmonious. Aw... it’s like a fluffy basket holding her dreams.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We’re fine, Dr. Kal'tsit.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Pfft.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Amiya’s turning red, Dr. {@nickname}.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: ...I didn’t want you to see that!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It’s okay. Mmhm. Okay.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Again... again. Amiya, let’s go forward a bit. I can feel it.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Third.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: ...Dr. Kal'tsit, I found them. All of them.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: We’re ready.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Yes, thank you. And thank you, Amiya.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Don’t thank me for doing my job, Rosmontis... no need. You know I love saying that, don’t you?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Uh huh. But you took me to the bridge, and to the mountain... and the clouds were so pretty.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: It’s a long road.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Let’s go, Amiya. We can go down.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Raidian, split the connections. You can take five.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Amiya, Rosmontis, keep the channel clear.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Okay, now, Raiden, Dr. Kal’tsit, Rosmontis...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Time to fight.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It looks like you have something on your mind.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: Your tone is much softer than it used to be.

attributes.content: That’s not what you’re thinking. But if you’d like, I can be harsher with you.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: Tell me about the kitten.;...Rosmontis.;I want to talk about the silver-haired girl.

attributes.content: You were very lucky back there.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Taking a step back, it may be that Rosmontis likes you. She controlled her outburst.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Otherwise you would have bitten off your own tongue watching Amiya and I guide her, and seeing the manifestation of her Arts.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...Rosmontis was born in a lab.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: She did not suffer the same tragedy as most experimental Infected. She did not die from the increasingly cruel experiments.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: As the project moved forward, she gradually crushed the entire facility.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The lab did not destroy her, she destroyed it. Her Arts are tied to her mental state.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The group that found her and smuggled her to Rhodes Island has made it clear that 'Rosmontis does not exist.'
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I know what you’re thinking. And no, through force or coercion, I would never allow an individual who has been through that to become an operator.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But Rosmontis herself chose responsibility, training, and companionship.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: With her subconscious Arts usage causing constant damage, the caster operators decided to train her. She had to mature faster than the others, which she fortunately wanted to do.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: We didn’t want to abandon her to the wilderness. We did not want to inject her with suppressants. And we certainly didn’t want Rhodes Island to be reduced to a heap of pulverized shrapnel.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: This solution was our last resort. We have to train her to use her Arts, rather than indulge or imprison her.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: She’s like Amiya in some ways, and unlike her in others.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: Don’t keep me in suspense.;...Elaborate.;I don’t quite understand.

attributes.content: Then let me finish, please.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: They are alike in that they will both fight to the end for other people.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: As for how they’re different—
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You know Amiya has never wanted to make enemies. Even when forced to do so, she fights back her tears, reluctantly destroying her enemies.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But Rosmontis, I could say, Doctor, that Rosmontis...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: She’s never given up on a mission. Faced with any situation, she handles it appropriate, and wins.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: That is our simultaneously reasonable and incomprehensible Annihilation Specialist, Rosmontis.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: She is an elite operator for no other reason than she met the standards across the entire battery of tests.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The operators who feared her came to know what she was really like and ultimately put their lives in her hands...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Because she protects them, with all her power.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: If Blaze won the respect of our people through leadership of her team, Rosmontis fought for their respect.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: She heard their expectations, and exceeded them.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: But there are practical considerations to her participation here.

attributes.content: There are other operators with detection Arts similar to Rosmontis’s, with different casting conditions.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Rosmontis can do more than just locate, you’ve seen the way she fights.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Dr. {@nickname}, we allowed Rosmontis to join this op because she is the best operator for the job, and because she believes as much herself.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Her Arts are also enough to help Amiya and I face the leader of the guerrillas...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: 'Patriot, of Reunion.'
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Dr. Kal'tsit! The abandoned trolley station, behind the fallen restaurant sign, the gate of #4 Secondary School, third floor of the town hall clocktower!
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Acknowledged.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Copy! I’ll go to the town hall, Dr. Kal'tsit!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Then we’ll go to #4 Secondary School, Doctor. Move.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: I’ll help you command, Dr. Kal'tsit.

attributes.content: Precisely.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Rosmontis, Amiya, and I will deal with the runners. And you...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Dr. {@nickname}, you will command our free units and slow the guerrilla fighters.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Remember, we target only the enemies we can target.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Once the guerrillas regroup, we fall back. We are here to complete our objective, not to entertain some fantastical idea of a direct fight.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: This will be a protracted battle. We could suffer casualties, or even total defeat.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: If that happens, we could be facing a new dark age for the Infected.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The best possible outcome for us could be that the command squad does not appear.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: We head straight for the command tower and the generator area, leaving the Reunion Infected to handle their own problems with the Infected.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But he won’t, not this guerrilla commander.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: He won’t lose control of the battle and watch his team fall apart. It is not faith alone that keeps his people together, he has the strength to live up to his name.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: After this battle, if all goes well... we will commit everything to a conflict with their command squad.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: We will face down Buldrokkas'tee.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit
